movie.title: Un ga yoke rya
movie.description_intro: Based on one famous Rakugo comic stories, Un ga yokerya (Gambler's Luck) is a light comedy set in the slums of old Edo.
movie.description_full: Based on one famous Rakugo comic stories, Un ga yokerya (Gambler's Luck) is a light comedy set in the slums of old Edo.

movies.title: Why, Why, Tell Me Why!
movies.summary: This is the first movie i have seen with Anita in it and it is the best. The movie, which literally means "Bad Girl", follows a guy's adventure in dating a mahjong addict.  The guy's mother was also a mahjong addict, she went play the second after the wedding, the birth, and wasn't there when the father died, so the guy swore he would only marry a non-mahjong-playing girl, a near impossible goal.  You will laugh until your sides ache through the courtship and the unsuspecting and twisted ending.

movies.title: I Believe in Miracles
movies.summary: The story of the history-making Nottingham Forest team that won back-to-back European Cups in 1979 and 1980, led by the mercurial Brian Clough and his assistant Peter Taylor.
movies.description_full: The story of the history-making Nottingham Forest team that won back-to-back European Cups in 1979 and 1980, led by the mercurial Brian Clough and his assistant Peter Taylor.
movies.synopsis: The story of the history-making Nottingham Forest team that won back-to-back European Cups in 1979 and 1980, led by the mercurial Brian Clough and his assistant Peter Taylor.

movies.title: Kes
movies.summary: Bullied at school and ignored and abused at home by his indifferent mother and older brother, Billy Casper (David Bradley), a 15-year-old working-class Yorkshire boy, tames and trains his pet kestrel falcon whom he names Kes. Helped and encouraged by his English teacher Mr. Farthing (Colin Welland) and his fellow students, Billy finally finds a positive purpose to his unhappy existence, until tragedy strikes.

movies.title: Beyond the Law
movies.summary: A former mobster turned businessman and a police detective must contend with a dirty ex-cop looking to bring the killer of his son to justice.
movies.description_full: A former mobster turned businessman and a police detective must contend with a dirty ex-cop looking to bring the killer of his son to justice.
